LanguageData.MechWeightClassExplanation: The Operating System of this robot.
LanguageData.MechWorkActivitiesExplanation: The work activities that can be performed by this robot.\n\nThe following list details which work activities can be done within each work type
LanguageData.MechRechargeSettingsExplanation: Change when robots will start and stop charging.\n\nRobots with energy below this range will automatically seek out a recharger. They will stop charging once they reach the top of this range. These settings only apply in work mode.
LanguageData.MechWorkSkillDesc: The skill level that this robot acts with.
LanguageData.CaravanLacksMechMechanitorWarning: Your caravan contains a robot but not their overseer. You will have limited control over the robot when you reach your destination.
